description:
Envision Pharma Group is a Technology Enabled Solutions Partner for the Life Science Industry with expertise in Commercialization, Value & Access, Artificial Intelligence, Data Analytics, and Integrated Medical Capabilities.

At our core, are our people, the manufacturers, and the patients our solutions impact and benefit across the globe. We drive growth through our innovations as an empowered, accountable, and entrepreneurial team. Our passion makes people healthier and happier.

It is an exciting time to join us! We are growing fast and as part of our continued growth, we are looking for dynamic and highly motivated new talent to join our amazing business and be part of a journey!

The opportunity:

As a member of the Business Analytics, Insights & Strategy (BAIS) team, the Business Development Representative (internally know as Lead Generation Specialist) will identify and qualify potential leads who are interested in leveraging AI technology within the life sciences industry. This position will play a crucial role in driving the adoption of our tech-enabled Medical Affairs, Value Access, and Commercial advisory services.

How will you make an impact at Envision Pharma Group?
• Conduct comprehensive market research to identify target segments within the life sciences industry that can benefit from AI solutions.
• Utilize AI technologies and industry knowledge to develop compelling value propositions that resonate with potential clients.
• Implement effective lead generation strategies, including targeted outreach, content marketing, and participation in relevant industry events and conferences.
• Engage with leads to understand their unique challenges and pain points, showcasing how our AI solutions can optimize their Medical Affairs, Value Access, and Commercial operations.
• Collaborate closely with the Global Business Development team to ensure a seamless transition of qualified leads, providing detailed lead profiles and relevant information.
• Cultivate relationships with key decision-makers within target organizations, delivering tailored presentations and demonstrations of our AI capabilities.
• Utilize CRM software and other lead management tools to track lead interactions, monitor progress, and maintain accurate lead data.

Do you have what we are looking for?
• Bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as Computer Science, Life Sciences, or Business Administration.
• 2+ years of experience in lead generation, sales, or business development, preferably within the life sciences or healthcare industry.
• 1+ years of experience with AI technologies, including machine learning, natural language processing, and/or data analytics.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with the capacity to understand client requirements and tailor AI solutions accordingly.
• Familiarity with CRM software and lead management tools for efficient lead tracking and reporting.

#TogetherWeDiscover

We turn vision into reality. Our people are integral to our success and our values reflect the Envision philosophy where our teamwork helps us all grow and our enthusiasm inspires each other.

Being a part of a collaborative team means there's no limit to what you can achieve. With us, you can be a part of growing the company you want to work for.

Find your purpose at Envision. If you have the experience highlighted above, we would love to hear from you!
